thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 9 of 1869
thread.title: Norman

author: Norman
title: Norman
text: Pros, Ive used flighthub to go to places that i couldnt afford otherwise. Iceland, italy, irelnd and now im going to vietnam. I recommend this to anyone on a buget. Cons. You have to undertand that the tickets re cheap so there are long flights and some long layovers. To me that con turns into a pro becuase i take advantage of long layovers and i visit what every city im having a layover in. Even though it may be short but becuase of layovers ive been to amsterdam, england, norway and will be in china soon. . I dont sit in the airport. I seize the moment and go to the cloest city and have an experience of a life time. Even if its for a couple hours i get visit places not on my agenda list. To me thats what travelling is all about.
